I.Personal Details:

 II.Education: 
2001: Graduated Dao Duy Tu high school at Quang Binh. 
2006: Bachelor in major of Information Technology at University of 
Natural Science – Vietnam National University of Ho Chi Minh City 
  III. Skills: 
1. Networking: 
○ Understanding and knowledge in Unix System: setup, install, secure 
hosting for magento site via SSH/Shell 
○ Using Operating System: MAC. 
○ Understanding hosting environments for web server, for example: 
Cloud Hosting, Amazon AWS EC2. 
2. Programming: 
○ Understanding about: OOP, Design Patterns, 3 tier model, E-
C omm e rc e. 
○ PHP and MySQL. 
○  A J A X ,  J qu e r y ,  JSON ,  JS.  ○ 
CSS, HTML, XML. 
○ Responsive on multi devices 
○ Magento: templates, manage and extension. I've been working with 
Ma ge nto  si nc e  v e r si on  1.1. 2 .

3. Database: 
○ Knowledge in MySQL. 
○ English: Good. 
   IV. Working Experiences: 
○ VINACIS GROUP: Network Technician From 03-05/ 2004 
- First job as a student, part time job as an IT room technical. It 
was a very modem game online Internet shop with good 
investment from Vietnamese guys come back home from 
Germany. They wanted to build something but it was not 
going far enough. Just a few months of working, but I have 
learned how to work in a team with many bosses from 
E urop e. 
○ TTSoft: PHP developer 
From 2006 - 2008 
- Senior developer is my position, the first job that I have after 
un i v e r si t y . 
- The company developed CRM and ERM system. They have a 
good software about accounting named A1 software. It was 
built from Delphi language, sourced from Russian, i think. 
- I was working on A1 system, then move to PHP language in 
some small projects, then the company lost the PHP team 
leader. They cut out the PHP part, it was the time I started to 
r ese arch  f r eel anc i n g. 
○ UpWork (formerly known as ODesk)    From 2008 -present 
- Working as a freelancer, Magento/Shopify expert. Please 
view my profile to see how my clients reviewed and gave 
feedback 
● https://www.upwork.com/freelancers/~015685ecd685e7de27 
?viewMode=1 
- I was working for 2 big guys from US: Mark Gadala from 
LucidSiteDesigns and Victor Pella from IdeaExpress 
- LucidSiteDesigns: https://www.lucidsitedesigns.com/ based from 
Miami, Florida. Web Design company, they find the clients, projects 
and send to me so my job is just to focus on technical, Magento, 
Wordpress, Shopify and sometime Symfony. 
-  Se cond  g u y  is  I d e a E xpr ess:  http s:// www . cu s tom gl a ss war e. com / 
Company located in Nevada, they are working on making custom 
printed promotional products. With many domains, and run on only 
one admin. The job is magento developer, sometimes it’s PHP 
custom script for requirements of company. 
- You can contact 3 guys below to ask about me: 
+ Mark Gadala (from US): mark@lucidsitedesigns.com +
Nghia (from France): nghia@sojeng.com 
+ Steven (UK): singler3@gmail.com
